title: Changes in KE and L of a skater

content.question: A figure skater goes into a spin with arms fully extended. Which of the following describes the changes in the rotational kinetic energy and angular momentum of the skater as the skaterâ€™s arms are brought toward the body?

choices.label: Rotational Kinetic Energy Angular Momentum Remains the same Increases
Rotational Kinetic Energy Angular Momentum Remains the same Remains the same
Rotational Kinetic Energy Angular Momentum Increases Remains the same
Rotational Kinetic Energy Angular Momentum Decreases Increases
Rotational Kinetic Energy Angular Momentum Decreases Remains the same

content.answer: Rotational Kinetic Energy Angular Momentum Increases Remains the same

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
